6a9ac0d4-80b3-4045-8243-e60d28fef0bc.description: Earners of this badge are skilled coaches up to the standards of the International Coaching Federation's (ICF) Associate Certified Coach credential. Earners have the ability to provide meaningful, professional coaching to clients, direct reports and colleagues. They understand all the ethical requirements of coaching and demonstrate the ICF Coaching Core Competencies with proficiency.
6a9ac0d4-80b3-4045-8243-e60d28fef0bc.name: LCI Certified Coach

issuer.summary: issued by The Leader Coach Intensive & The Women's Leadership Intensive

entity.name: The Leader Coach Intensive & The Women's Leadership Intensive

alignments.name: International Coaching Federation Associate Certified Coach
alignments.description: Requirements: At least 60 hours of coach-specific training through an ACTP or ACSTH program. 10 hours of Mentor Coaching over a minimum of three months. Your Mentor Coach must be an ACC, PCC or MCC. Minimum 100 hours (70 paid*) of coaching experience following the start of your coach-specific training. Completion of the Coach Knowledge Assessment.

badge_template_activities.title: Attend LCI Coach Certification Training Program which takes place over 26 weeks. The course includes 70 hours of instruction plus application / practice,

The LCI Coach Certification Training includes on-going assessment to provide direction and mentoring, plus a final assessment which is a pass/fail practical exam (live coaching or a recording of coaching).
Mentor Coaching: This course includes 10 hours of mentor coaching from ICF certified coaches (PCC level or higher).
LCI is accredited by the ICF as an ACSTH approved coach training provider. This course teaches to the requirements of the ICF ACC credential for internationally recognized and certified coaches.

f83a71dc-3905-4562-99b7-09a7351c2ff0.description: Candidates for this badge are in the process of becoming skilled coaches up to the standards of the International Coaching Federation's (ICF) Associate Certified Coach credential. Earners have the ability to provide meaningful, professional coaching to clients, direct reports and colleagues. They understand all the ethical requirements of coaching and demonstrate the ICF Coaching Core Competencies with proficiency.
f83a71dc-3905-4562-99b7-09a7351c2ff0.name: LCI Certified Coach Candidate

alignments.description: Requirements: At least 60 hours of coach-specific training through an ACTP or ACSTH program. 10 hours of Mentor Coaching over a minimum of three months. Your Mentor Coach must be an ACC, PCC or MCC. Minimum 100 hours (70 paid*) of coaching experience following the start of your coach-specific training. Completion of the Coach Knowledge Assessment.

badge_template_activities.title: Attend LCI Coach Certification Training Program which takes place over 26 weeks. The course includes 70 hours of instruction plus application / practice,

The LCI Coach Certification Training includes on-going assessment to provide direction and mentoring, plus a final assessment which is a pass/fail practical exam (live coaching or a recording of coaching).
Mentor Coaching: This course includes 10 hours of mentor coaching from ICF certified coaches (PCC level or higher).
LCI is accredited by the ICF as an ACSTH approved coach training provider. This course teaches to the requirements of the ICF ACC credential for internationally recognized and certified coaches.

98b41269-64fb-4235-aec6-9e6b66cb7038.description: Earners of this badge have participated in the year-long Women's Leadership Intensive program. Earners have developed deep leadership skills and practice in leading teams, developing people, leading change, leadership voice, values-based leadership, purpose-driven leadership, resilience in self and others, coaching, gender equity and women's leadership.
98b41269-64fb-4235-aec6-9e6b66cb7038.name: Women's Leadership Intensive Program

issuer.summary: issued by The Leader Coach Intensive & The Women's Leadership Intensive

entity.name: The Leader Coach Intensive & The Women's Leadership Intensive

alignments.name: International Coaching Federation Associate Certified Coach
alignments.description: WLI is an accredited provider of ICF Continuing Coach Education (CCE) units in both core competencies and resource development categories.

badge_template_activities.title: Attend three in-person women's leadership development retreats over the course of one year. A total of 6 in person training days.

The WLI includes monthly application and practice activities, and on-going professional coaching (by ICF PCC level or higher), mentoring, and peer feedback throughout the year to ensure practical application of the training over time.

Attendance at up to 8 online learning modules with topics such as Impact Planning, Leadership Brand, Imposter Syndrome, Diversity, Equity & Inclusion, Value Your Value, Financial Confidence, Leading Sustainability, and Effective Communication. Each online module is 2 hours.

3ccc2937-f0d3-4fa2-bc72-f79d00bc3c66.description: Earners of this badge have participated in the six-week Women's Leadership Online Course. Earners have developed leadership skills and practice in setting vision and goals, values-based leadership, purpose-driven leadership, women's empowerment, power dynamics in organizations, leadership presence and developing people.
3ccc2937-f0d3-4fa2-bc72-f79d00bc3c66.name: Women's Leadership Online Course

issuer.summary: issued by The Leader Coach Intensive & The Women's Leadership Intensive

entity.name: The Leader Coach Intensive & The Women's Leadership Intensive

badge_template_activities.title: Attend live, online training for six weeks, 2 hours per week, for a total of 12 hours of instruction and workshops. Complete assignments following each week's training for a total of 30-60 minutes of independent study per week.

Weekly Topics: Week 1- GOAL SETTING: Get clear on what matters to you and how to achieve your goals. Week 2- PURPOSE: Uncover your own leadership values and beliefs. Week 3- POWER: Gain the courage and confidence to lead in alignment with your values. Week 4- PRESENCE: Be intentional in the way you show up as a leader. Week 5- THE CALL TO LEAD: Understand why the world needs women leaders and how your unique contribution makes a difference. Week 6- NEXT STEPS.
This course includes coaching, mentoring and peer feedback to ensure application throughout the six weeks and beyond.
